mapper.select: select * from object_root where root_id=#{root_Id} and root_pwd=#{root_Pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into object_root (root_idn, root_name, root_id, root_pwd, root_email, root_grade) values (object_root_seq.nextVal, #{root_Name},#{root_Id},#{root_Pwd},#{root_Email}, 0)
mapper.update: update object_root set root_Pwd = #{root_Pwd}, root_Email=#{root_Email}, root_Job=#{root_Job}, root_Address=#{root_Address} where root_Id = #{root_Id}
